name: Iliovasillema Suites

reviews.text: One of the best hotels i have ever visited. Really good prices, amazing view, and great customer service. It was an amazing experience.
reviews.title: Unbelievable Experience
Our Sanctuary
reviews.text: After spending 2 1/2 weeks travelling through Italy with friends we were looking forward to a romantic 6 days by ourselves on Santorini - and that's exactly what we got.

reviews.title: Excellent Trip
reviews.text: When we got out of the taxi at the apartments I was excited but ,so far, indifferent HOWEVER, once we headed toward reception I was speechless, literally! The view stunning! The welcome lovely. We made our way to the apartment and i was stunned.
Our apartment was beyond expectations. The master bedroom and the lounge had their own balconies. We had a small kitchenette, but big enough to whip up a simple meal and/or aftenoon nibbles.
reviews.title: We Loved It!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

likes.liked: — THE GREAT SUNSET & THE GREAT STAFF

reviews.text: WE HAD VIEWS OF THE SUNSET THAT CHALLENGED IOA! Seriously.
reviews.title: What a beaut!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed for 3 nights at the hotel in an apartment. While room was located at the bottom of an endless flight of stairs, it was well worth the walk. The room was clean and had a great view of Oia and the caldera. The rooms are close together and nearby public paths (like sidewalks) so you cant leave the windows open over night. The rooms had AC though. The pool was nice, albeit small and deep. You could not relax in the pool without treading water or holding on to the side. The various patios were great for relaxing on chaise lounges in the sun. The owner and staff were attentive -- the service was excellent. Visit Santorini Mou for an incredible meal in Oia -- Mikalis is a great host and you will have a blast listening to him play the guitar. Also eat at Momma's Cafe in Fira for a great breakfast (try the blueberry pancakes).
reviews.title: Picturesque and Hospitable Hotel

likes.disliked: — Large amount of stairs needed to climb to reach/leave the room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 2 very memorable nights at the hotel in September. In our opinion, the hotel is situated in the best location in Santorini. It is right at the top of the cliff-tops at Imerovigli, over looking the volcano and the deep-blue Caldera lagoon.
reviews.title: A truly magical stay...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in Superior Appartment 15 ("Panorama"), which really lived up to its name! It had 2 balconies, and offered unforgetable views of the Santorinian sunset (Iliovasilema means sunset in Greek). We were able to see the entire stretch of Santorinian coast, from Oia at one end to the lighthouse at the other. Most of the other boutique hotels at Imerovigli would not come close to matching these panoramic views. The appartment was furnished in traditional Cycladic style, and was very charming and romantic.
reviews.title: The best!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel has a small but perfectly adequate pool and great sunloungers. As it is south-facing, you get uninterrupted sun from mid-day right until the sun sets.
reviews.title: Exceptional Place will go back in a heart beat!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are several good Greek & international restaurants within walking distance. Imerovigli is not the livliest part of the island (Oia has more restaurants, and Fira is where all the touristy night-life is), but is definitely the most beautiful. It is easy to hire a quad-bike/car if you want to explore the other areas.
reviews.title: Gorgeous view but average studios!

description: In Imerovigli, one of the most beautiful villages of Santorini Island, you will find the ILIOVASILEMA HOTEL APARTMENTS ("Iliovasilema" is the Greek word for "sunset"). Iliovasilema is situated on the enchanting and world famous Caldera. Built 350m above sea level, offers to its guests the most fascinating view of the volcano and the little islands of the Aegean Sea, as well as of the dazzling sunset. Iliovasilema was initially built in year 1996, has been renovated and remodeled in year 2002 and still grows, following always the rules and the tradition of the Cycladic architecture!
